intro:
A puzzle-solving and escape game set in a nostalgic vacant lot where you used to play as a child!
Solve the riddles in the vacant lot and try to escape.
description:
■Game System
This is an escape game (riddle solving adventure game).
The game progresses by selecting screens with the cursor and solving various tricks.

■Story
The time of a walk as usual
I decided to take a route that I have not taken for a long time recently.

The vacant lot where I used to play as a child should be in sight soon.

--However, the vacant lot was surrounded by a fence and a large “under construction” sign was blocking the entrance.

I was curious, so I stuck my head through the gap in the fence to take a peek inside.
Immediately I felt the ground jump up.

I picked myself up from the dirt and looked around.
I looked around and saw that it was that vacant lot I had missed so much.
